info.title: Global product hierarchy manager
info.description: Add, get, remove and update global product hierarchy entries.

method.name: add
method.description:
Add a new global product hierarchy.
NOTE: You must be member of the Retail Product Manager user group in order to add a global hierarchy.

parameter.name: $description
parameter.description: The hierarchy description. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: get
method.description: Get the global product hierarchy in an array.
method.returndescription: An array of all product hierarchies.

method.name: update
method.description:
Update a product hierarchy (title and description).
NOTE: If it is a global hierarchy, you must be member of the Retail Product Manager user group in order to update it.

parameter.name: $description
parameter.description: The hierarchy description. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: info
method.returndescription: An array of all hierarchy attributes.
